name: agora_test_server
description: To generate agora token, we need a simple express application. ```sh $ npm init -y ``` This will initialize a basic `package.json` file. Now, install the dependecies. ``` $ npm install express agora-token-generator dot-env ``` Now, create a basic express application. In `server.js` file put the following code. ```javascript const express = require("express"); const app = express();
